author: cmpilato
msg: Add XFAILing regression test for not-yet-fixed bug: files added via merge
from a foreign repository shouldn't keep the UUID of the foreign repository.

author: julianfoad
msg: (delete_file_and_dir): Remove the last part of this test, where it was
trying to get a merge to delete modified nodes, because we no longer
want such deletes to go ahead silently and there are separate tests in
in the realm of tree conflicts to cover this.
